item.title: Tony Christie - (Is This The Way To) Amarillo - Key of A
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Amarillo
(Is This The Way To) Amarillo - Tony Christie The song featuring Peter Kay was re-released in 2002
Using the chords: A C D E7 F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
